title: Swap LoginPage carousel 2nd image to cal.png

requirements.summary: Add uploaded cal.png as a static asset under frontend/public/assets for runtime reference without modification.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/cal.png` exists and is served by the app at `/assets/cal.png`.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image file cal.png exactly as provided (no resizing/cropping/styling changes) so it is served as a static asset at /assets/cal.png.

requirements.summary: Replace only the 2nd LoginPage preview image src with /assets/cal.png while keeping the gallery at 4 images.
acceptanceCriteria: The `PREVIEW_IMAGES` array still contains exactly 4 images.
Only the second image’s `src` is changed to `'/assets/cal.png'`; the other three `src` values remain unchanged.
When navigating the carousel to image #2 (via arrows, swipe, or the 2nd dot), the displayed screenshot is the uploaded `cal.png`.

file_operations.description: Update the `PREVIEW_IMAGES` array so the 2nd entry’s `src` changes from `'/assets/main2a.png'` to `'/assets/cal.png'`, leaving entries 1, 3, and 4 unchanged and keeping the array length at 4.
